有着可爱红眼睛的蝙蝠侠。[克制海洋系]: A cute red-eyed Bat Hero. [Counters Ocean-type]
......爷爷我也想成为一名像您一样的黄金训练师。: Grandpa... I also want to become a Golden Trainer like you.
3回合敌人不能使用3级以上技能攻击: For 3 turns, the enemy cannot attack using skills above Lv.3.
“彩虹杯训练师大赛”最激动人心的决赛现在开始！: The most exciting final of the "Rainbow Cup Trainer Tournament" begins now!
一次性消耗当前所有能量，并转化为同等伤害: Consume all current energy at once and convert it into equal damage.
一次性消耗当前所有能量，额外增加同等伤害。: Consume all current energy at once and gain additional damage equal to it.
下面有请彩虹城少年组的冠军，塞其登场。: Now please welcome the Rainbow City youth champion, Saqi!
Meanwhile, an even more mysterious pet organization slowly appeared on the stage of history...
为了我敬爱的爱得老爷，我一定要好好打扫！: For my beloved Lord Aide, I must clean properly!
什么时候我才有资格进入国立宠物学院学习呢？: When will I be qualified to enter the National Pet Academy?
今天是彩虹杯的决赛，我们来负责保证安全。: Today is the Rainbow Cup final—we're here to ensure security.
今天的人好多啊，到底发生了什么？: There are so many people today—what happened?
仙人掌系的幼苗，全身长满刺。[克制飞行系]: A cactus sprout covered in spines. [Counters Flying-type]
以周身的巨刺击退敌人。[克制飞行系]: Repels enemies with its massive spines. [Counters Flying-type]
传说中狮身鹰兽，异常凶猛的野兽。[克制海洋系]: The legendary griffin—an exceptionally ferocious beast. [Counters Ocean-type]
Can't you all use the same terms...
你快去彩虹广场看看吧，开始#3招生#0啦！: Go to Rainbow Square—#3enrollment#0 has started!
你是准备先去捉宠吗？你家里不是已经有很多宠物了么？: Are you going to catch pets first? Don't you already have a lot at home?
你看我站在盆栽丛中像一朵花吗？: Do I look like a flower standing among these potted plants?
俊美的天马，皇家天马的典范。[克制海洋系]: A handsome pegasus, the model of Royal Pegasi. [Counters Ocean-type]
保护彩虹城是我的责任！: Protecting Rainbow City is my duty!
修行多年的树精，实力非凡。[克制飞行系]: A tree spirit that has trained for years, with extraordinary strength. [Counters Flying-type]
全副武装的机械狂鲸。[克制金属系]: A fully armed mechanical mad whale. [Counters Metal-type]
全身充满致命毒液的树怪。[克制飞行系]: A tree monster filled with deadly venom. [Counters Flying-type]
全身盔甲的强大武者。[克制野兽系]: A powerful warrior clad in armor. [Counters Beast-type]
六臂老虎，虎族的强大首领。[克制植物系]: A six-armed tiger, the powerful leader of the Tiger Clan. [Counters Plant-type]
冠军请上前领奖。: Champion, please step forward to receive your award.
出城就是城南了，金属遗迹的入口就在那里。: Leaving the city takes you south—the entrance to the Metal Ruins is right there.
利用五彩斑斓的外表吸引猎物，然后一口吞掉。[克制飞行系]: Lures prey with its colorful appearance, then swallows it in one bite. [Counters Flying-type]
前往购物中心买一些必需品。: Go to the shopping mall and buy some necessities.
包裹着金属外皮的古怪宠物。[克制野兽系]: A strange pet wrapped in a metal shell. [Counters Beast-type]
华丽的金皮显示着王者的尊贵，强劲的力量足以让对手臣服。[克制野兽系]: Its gorgeous golden hide shows royal dignity; its power is enough to make any foe submit. [Counters Beast-type]
卢克大人和米罗大人谁比较厉害呢？: Who is stronger, Lord Luke or Lord Milo?
卢克大公的雕像[金属王国内战的英雄]: Statue of Duke Luke [Hero of the Metal Kingdom Civil War]
受到攻击时有30%的几率伤害减半: When attacked, there is a 30% chance for damage to be halved.
受攻击时几乎不会进入撕裂和腐蚀状态: When attacked, it almost never enters Bleed or Corrosion.
可爱的小树怪。[克制飞行系]: A cute little tree monster. [Counters Flying-type]
各金属王国为了对抗这一情况最终合并为一个强大的王国,大家称呼为#7彩虹王国#0。: To counter this, the metal kingdoms eventually united into a powerful nation known as #7Rainbow Kingdom#0.
周身充满磁性的宠物。[克制野兽系]: A pet filled with magnetism. [Counters Beast-type]
周身的毒刺有令敌人立即毙命的强大威力。[克制飞行系]: Its poisonous spines have lethal power that can kill instantly. [Counters Flying-type]
呵呵呵，大家都很卖力啊！: Heh heh heh, everyone is working hard!
呵呵看来洛克和那个女孩触到你的自尊心了，你可以去#7城南的金属遗迹#0看看，那边: Heh, looks like Locke and that girl hurt your pride. You can go check out #7the Metal Ruins south of the city#0—Metal-type pets often appear there!
呵呵，你也要出去多交交新朋友，爷爷不能老陪着你啊。: Heh, you should go out and make more new friends. Grandpa can't always stay with you.
呵呵，塞其高兴就好。下次见面塞其要成长为独当一面的男子汉啊！: Heh, as long as Saqi is happy. Next time we meet, you must grow into a man who can stand on his own!
哈哈，你被人劈头盖脸的教育了一顿哦。: Haha, you really got scolded hard.
哈哈，你马上就知道了，到时候你就努力证明自己吧。: Haha, you'll know soon enough. When the time comes, do your best to prove yourself.
哼哼，想进入金属学院？钱和实力都是必不可少的哦！: Hmph, want to enter the Metal Academy? Money and strength are both essential!
哼！让我们用实力说话，看看到底谁更强！！: Hmph! Let's settle this with strength—let's see who's stronger!!
哼，用家族培养的强力宠物获得胜利的人没有资格对我说教！: Hmph, someone who wins with family-bred pets has no right to lecture me!
哼，看到他你就怕了吧。: Hmph, you're scared as soon as you see him, aren't you?
哼，米罗，卢克，当年的仇我一定要报！: Hmph, Milo, Luke—I will repay the grudge from back then!
哼，这次我一定要击败你。: Hmph, this time I'll definitely defeat you.
啊啊啊啊，能量，我感到了无限的能量！不愧是稀有宠的能量，味道太甜美了！: Aaaah! Energy—I feel endless energy! Rare pet energy really is something else... it's so sweet!
喜欢恶作剧的可爱海龟。[克制金属系]: A cute turtle that loves pranks. [Counters Metal-type]
喜欢护目镜的和平爱好者。[克制金属系]: A peace-lover who loves goggles. [Counters Metal-type]
喜欢水中嬉戏的顽皮小鲸鱼。[克制金属系]: A mischievous little whale that loves playing in the water. [Counters Metal-type]
喜爱跳舞的小姑娘。[克制飞行系]: A little girl who loves dancing. [Counters Flying-type]
嗜血善战的战士，拥有不凡的实力。[克制野兽系]: A bloodthirsty warrior who loves battle, with uncommon strength. [Counters Beast-type]
嗯……不过我会证明我不是她说的那种人的。: Mm... but I'll prove I'm not the kind of person she says I am.
嗯？您这话是什么意思？: Huh? What do you mean by that?
在天空中翱翔的凶猛鸟类。[克制海洋系]: A ferocious bird that soars through the sky. [Counters Ocean-type]
在米罗毁灭了幽暗鬼王入侵金属王国的计划后，人们迎来了期待已久的和平。但仍有幽暗系: After Milo thwarted the Dark Ghost King's plan to invade the Metal Kingdom, people finally welcomed long-awaited peace. But Dark-type pets still continue to harass the human world.
塞其家历代都是黄金训练师，需要重点保护。: Saqi's family has produced Golden Trainers for generations and must be protected.
塞其快看！彩虹国立学院又开始#3招生#0了~哇塞~这可是#7黄金训练师#0的摇篮: Saqi, look! The Rainbow National Academy has started #3enrollment#0 again~ Wow~ It's the cradle of #7Golden Trainers#0!
塞其望着爷爷的背影，脑子里不断地琢磨着刚才爷爷的话。: Saqi stared at Grandpa's back, turning Grandpa's words over and over in his mind.
塞其，你不是一直想要只自己的宠物吗？这有三只刚捕捉的宠物幼仔，你挑一只吧。: Saqi, haven't you always wanted a pet of your own? Here are three newly caught baby pets—pick one.
塞其，加油啊，让爷爷看看你有没有进步。: Saqi, come on—let Grandpa see if you've improved.
复活死亡的宠物并为其回复生命值的30%: Revive a fallen pet and restore 30% of its HP.
夏威夷风情的小姑娘。[克制飞行系]: A little girl with Hawaiian vibes. [Counters Flying-type]
天生体质虚弱，生命比同类要少: Born with a weak constitution; has less HP than others of its kind.
天生呆呆的，可爱是我的代名词。[克制金属系]: Naturally a bit dazed—"cute" is my middle name. [Counters Metal-type]
天生铁头功。[克制野兽系]: Born with an iron headbutt. [Counters Beast-type]
天空中的王者，拥有神的实力。[克制海洋系]: King of the skies, with the power of a god. [Counters Ocean-type]
女王气质不凡的花仙。[克制飞行系]: A flower fairy with an extraordinary queenly aura. [Counters Flying-type]

好了，我先走了，明年我会追上塞其的。: Alright, I'm leaving. Next year I'll catch up to Saqi.
好可爱的香吻草~就要这只吧。: That Kiss Grass is so cute~ I'll take this one.
好啦，时间不早了，爷爷也要回去了。: Alright, it's getting late. Grandpa has to head back too.
好激动啊，我不等你了，我先过去了！: I'm so excited! I'm not waiting for you—I'm going ahead!
威风凛凛的银狐族王子。[克制植物系]: A dashing silver fox prince. [Counters Plant-type]
宠物和地形一一对应，在不适应的地形上宠物只能发挥#785%#0的能力。后期宠物可: Pets correspond to terrains one-to-one. On an unsuitable terrain, a pet can only use #785%#0 of its power. Later, pets can learn skills that #7change the terrain#0.
宠物是重要，但宠物和训练师的心灵沟通才是最重要的。: Pets are important, but the bond between pet and trainer is what matters most.
容易被错认为小猫的豹子。[克制植物系]: A leopard easily mistaken for a kitten. [Counters Plant-type]
对了，彩虹城附近最近的野外是城南，那里是有利于植物系的#7花园地形#0，里面多是: Oh right—the nearest wild area near Rainbow City is the south of the city. It's the #7Garden terrain#0, which favors #5Plant-type and Beast-type pets#0. You can use this to choose your first pet! So, which one will you pick?
对了，彭彭你知道彩虹城周围哪有宠物的聚集地吗？: By the way, Pengpeng, do you know where pets gather around Rainbow City?
小飞龙进化体，速度很快。[克制海洋系]: An evolved small wyvern—very fast. [Counters Ocean-type]
少爷终有一日会成为黄金训练师。: One day the Young Master will become a Golden Trainer.
少爷需要什么服务吗？: Is there anything you need, Young Master?
巨大的体型，温柔的心。[克制金属系]: A huge body with a gentle heart. [Counters Metal-type]
已经化作人形的神奇果子。[克制飞行系]: A magical fruit that has taken human form. [Counters Flying-type]
幽灵系的王者。[克制其它五系]: The king of Ghost-types. [Counters the other five types]
异化出最强之盾的强大生物。[克制植物系]: A powerful creature that has evolved into the strongest shield. [Counters Plant-type]
彩虹城是#7遗迹地形#0，你用野兽系的宠物是不能发挥它的实力的。这是起码的#7地: Rainbow City is #7Ruins terrain#0. Beast-type pets can't fully perform here. This is basic knowledge about #7terrain and pets#0...
彩虹城是彩虹王国最繁华的城市了！: Rainbow City is the most prosperous city in the Rainbow Kingdom!
彩虹学院里可是有全面的宠物知识，有最好的老师，更有很多热爱宠物的人。: Rainbow Academy has comprehensive pet knowledge, the best teachers, and many people who love pets.
彩虹宠物训练师学院本期招生开始，15-18岁间的有意入学者需携带2只宠物和学费于: Enrollment for the Rainbow Pet Trainer Academy begins. Applicants aged 15–18 must bring 2 pets and the tuition fee to register at the academy by tomorrow.
彩虹广场往南走就是了，找不到的话请按“0”查看。: Just head south from Rainbow Square. If you can't find it, press “0” to view.
很萌的天马，让人忍不住想抱抱。[克制海洋系]: An adorable pegasus—makes you want to hug it. [Counters Ocean-type]
忠心且英勇的战士。[克制野兽系]: A loyal and brave warrior. [Counters Beast-type]
快乐的树精，喜欢搞怪。[克制飞行系]: A cheerful tree spirit that loves to fool around. [Counters Flying-type]
性情平和的长者，发怒时拥有毁灭一切的强大威力。[克制飞行系]: A calm elder; when angered, it has the power to destroy everything. [Counters Flying-type]
成年龙体，拥有了强大的肉体力量。[克制海洋系]: An adult dragon form with tremendous physical strength. [Counters Ocean-type]
我不想老被人说是靠家族的力量才能获得冠军的。: I don't want people always saying I only won because of my family's power.
我不想长大，童话是我的至爱。[克制金属系]: I don't want to grow up—fairy tales are my favorite. [Counters Metal-type]
我准备要报名了，彭彭，你呢？: I'm going to register, Pengpeng. What about you?

我宣布，本届的彩虹城训练师大赛的冠军依然是塞其！: I hereby announce: the champion of this Rainbow City Trainer Tournament is once again Saqi!
我家那口子总在彩虹城南采草药。: My other half is always picking herbs south of Rainbow City.
我终于可以培养一只真正属于自己的宠物了！谢谢爷爷！: I can finally raise a pet that truly belongs to me! Thank you, Grandpa!
我要先去#7广场的购物中心#0买些#7捕获球#0，来捉一只属于自己的宠物。: First I'll go to #7the shopping mall at the square#0 to buy some #7Capture Balls#0 and catch a pet of my own.
我还差一岁才到入学的年龄，可恶！: I'm still one year short of the enrollment age—damn it!
手持双刀的强大螳螂。[克制植物系]: A powerful mantis wielding two blades. [Counters Plant-type]
手握长枪冲锋在前的将军。[克制野兽系]: A general charging in front with a long spear. [Counters Beast-type]
拥有健壮的体质，生命比同类要多: Has a robust constitution; has more HP than others of its kind.
拥有性感嘴唇的奇特植物。[克制飞行系]: A strange plant with sexy lips. [Counters Flying-type]
拥有最强大魔力的可爱萝莉。[克制飞行系]: A cute loli with the strongest magic. [Counters Flying-type]
拥有毁灭一切的可怕破坏力。[克制野兽系]: Has terrifying destructive power that can destroy everything. [Counters Beast-type]
拥有神秘深海力量的神秘海龟。[克制金属系]: A mysterious turtle with mysterious deep-sea power. [Counters Metal-type]
捕捉宠物必备,效果一般: Essential for catching pets; average effect.
捕捉宠物必备,效果很好: Essential for catching pets; very effective.
捕获失败时敌人也不会逃跑[捉宠专用]: Enemies won't flee even if capture fails [for catching pets].
攻击时减少敌人25%的宠物忠诚度: When attacking, reduce the enemy pet's loyalty by 25%.
攻击时同时减少敌人宠物25%的忠诚度: When attacking, also reduce the enemy pet's loyalty by 25%.
攻防都不错的可爱穿山甲。[克制野兽系]: A cute pangolin with decent offense and defense. [Counters Beast-type]
放心吧，少不了你们的。: Don't worry—there's plenty for you all.
散发着神圣光芒的雄狮，金属系最强的存在！[克制野兽系]: A lion radiating holy light—the strongest of Metal-types! [Counters Beast-type]
无辜的眼神难掩恶魔本质。[克制野兽系]: Innocent eyes can't hide its demon nature. [Counters Beast-type]
是真正能够提升自己的地方。我看你不过是个一无是处的贵族罢了。: This is a place where you can truly improve yourself. I think you're just a useless noble.
月色下孤傲的夜之王者。[克制植物系]: The lonely king of the night under moonlight. [Counters Plant-type]
有着可爱棉花糖耳朵的前卫小鸟。[克制海洋系]: A trendy little bird with cute cotton-candy ears. [Counters Ocean-type]
有着时髦爆炸头的神奇果子，实力不凡。[克制飞行系]: A magical fruit with a stylish afro, with uncommon strength. [Counters Flying-type]
梦想飞行的帅气海豚。[克制金属系]: A handsome dolphin that dreams of flying. [Counters Metal-type]
死亡后有70%的几率自动复活: After dying, there is a 70% chance to automatically revive.
毛球的究极状态，成熟而肃穆。[克制海洋系]: Furball's ultimate form—mature and solemn. [Counters Ocean-type]

没事，爷爷，我们先回去吧！: It's okay, Grandpa. Let's go back first!
没关系的，塞其，明年我一定会来的，你要在学院里等着我啊。: It's fine, Saqi. Next year I'll definitely come. Wait for me at the academy!
没有去过就妄下结论了吗。: So you've never been there and you're already judging it?
洛克终有一天能获得冠军的，我相信他！: One day Locke will become champion—I believe in him!
洛克说的对，那些都是爷爷培养的，不能算我的。: Locke is right—Grandpa raised those. They don't really count as mine.
洛克，一定要挑战成功啊！: Locke, you have to succeed in the challenge!
洛克，你只当宠物是战斗的工具却从不真正关心宠物，你永远都不可能成为像少爷一样优秀: Locke, you treat pets as tools for battle and never truly care about them. You'll never become a trainer as great as the Young Master!
洛克，你应该向塞其学习，真正的关心一下你的宠物，他们都很疲劳了，所以和你的#5忠: Locke, you should learn from Saqi and truly care about your pets. They're exhausted, so their #5Loyalty#0 is already very low.
洛克，忠诚度太低的话根本不能发挥全部的实力，而且还有可能不听主人话。: Locke, if loyalty is too low, they can't perform at full strength—and they may not obey you.
活跃于地底深处，嗜食铜矿。[克制野兽系]: Active deep underground and loves eating copper ore. [Counters Beast-type]
浑身长满荆棘的树怪。[克制飞行系]: A tree monster covered in thorns. [Counters Flying-type]
海洋中令人敬畏的杀手。[克制金属系]: A feared killer of the ocean. [Counters Metal-type]
海洋中最为危险的存在。[克制金属系]: The most dangerous being in the ocean. [Counters Metal-type]

爷爷不多呆几天吗？: Grandpa, won't you stay a few more days?
爷爷保证，马上你就会有这个机会了！: Grandpa promises—you'll have that chance very soon!
牙齿爪子十分锋利的暗影者。[克制植物系]: A shadow stalker with razor-sharp teeth and claws. [Counters Plant-type]
白金龙的幼仔，非常顽皮。[克制海洋系]: A playful baby Platinum Dragon. [Counters Ocean-type]
盛开出美丽花朵的花仙，植物系远景闻名的战士。[克制飞行系]: A flower fairy blooming with beautiful blossoms, a famed Plant-type ranger warrior. [Counters Flying-type]
看来今年又是我们家的塞其最厉害喽。: Looks like our Saqi is the best again this year.
看来吸收了其它宠物的生命后，和白金龙战斗时所受的伤已经痊愈了。: After absorbing other pets' life force, the injuries from fighting the Platinum Dragon seem to have healed.

算了，这些宠物应该能让他满足的。: Forget it—these pets should satisfy him.
米罗大人是我见过的最厉害的宠物训练师了！我也要成为他那样的黄金训练师！: Lord Milo is the greatest pet trainer I've ever seen! I want to become a Golden Trainer like him!
约好和朋友比赛，用哪个属性的宠物比较好呢？: I'm meeting a friend for a match—what attribute pet should I use?
绝对的王者，撩人的气势已经让人无法靠近。[克制野兽系]: The absolute king; its intimidating aura makes it impossible to approach. [Counters Beast-type]
绝美善良的美丽歌者。[克制金属系]: A beautiful and kind singer. [Counters Metal-type]
翱翔在蓝色天际的神之使者。[克制海洋系]: A divine messenger soaring in the blue sky. [Counters Ocean-type]
老爷放心，塞其少爷一定能蝉联冠军的。: Don't worry, my lord. Young Master Saqi will surely defend his championship.
能坐能战斗的实用小海豚。[克制金属系]: A practical little dolphin that can be ridden and can fight. [Counters Metal-type]
获得2倍经验(可与经验丰富同时使用): Gain 2x EXP (can be used together with 'Experienced').
获得3倍经验(可与经验多多同时使用): Gain 3x EXP (can be used together with 'More EXP').
虎族中最优秀的战士。[克制植物系]: The finest warrior among the Tiger Clan. [Counters Plant-type]
虎族中骁勇善战的勇者。[克制植物系]: A brave, battle-hardened hero among the Tiger Clan. [Counters Plant-type]
虽然因为工作原因很少回家，但爱得老爷是我见过最值得尊敬的人了，少爷一定要体谅老爷: Because of work I rarely go home, but Lord Aide is the most respectable person I've ever met. Young Master must understand him.
蛇王难过蛇后关。[克制野兽系]: The Snake King's trial is tough; the Snake Queen's is even tougher. [Counters Beast-type]
被动技能，提高植物系宠物腐蚀的威力: Passive skill: increases the power of Plant-type corrosion.
覆盖着白金外壳的勇猛之狮。[克制野兽系]: A valiant lion covered in a platinum shell. [Counters Beast-type]
话还没说清楚就跑了，算了去#7彩虹广场#0看看吧。: He ran off before explaining. Whatever—let's go take a look at #7Rainbow Square#0.
该技能可使敌人暂时不能使用3级以上技能: This skill temporarily prevents the enemy from using skills above Lv.3.
该死，居然拥有这么强大的宠物。: Damn... it actually has such a powerful pet.
请冠军的#7挑战者洛克#0上场！: Please welcome the champion's #7challenger Locke#0 to the stage!
象征着威严与力量的天使之长。[克制海洋系]: The archangel who symbolizes majesty and power. [Counters Ocean-type]
购物中心应该在彩虹城的北面，去买点必需品吧。: The shopping mall should be north of Rainbow City. Go buy some necessities.
贵族学院不过是有钱孩子养尊处优的地方，真的能培养优秀的训练师吗？: Is the Noble Academy just a place where rich kids live in comfort? Can it really train excellent trainers?
贼眉鼠眼的可爱蝙蝠。[克制海洋系]: A cute bat with shifty eyes. [Counters Ocean-type]
这届招生我一定要加油进去！一定要完成我的梦想！: This enrollment, I must get in! I must fulfill my dream!
这里就是金属国立宠物学院的入口了！: This is the entrance to the National Metal Pet Academy!
进入国立学院是我一直以来的梦想！: Entering the National Academy has always been my dream!
那爷爷就送你这只香吻草！: Then Grandpa will give you this Kiss Grass!
酷爱户外运动的兄弟。[克制野兽系]: Brothers who love outdoor sports. [Counters Beast-type]
酷酷的和平守护者。[克制金属系]: A cool guardian of peace. [Counters Metal-type]
里面放着未知物品的宝箱，需要钥匙才能打开: A treasure chest containing unknown items; it requires a key to open.
野外有很多厉害的宠物，真想把它们都捕捉过来！: There are so many strong pets in the wild—I really want to catch them all!
野猪界的黑社会头头。[克制植物系]: The boar world's underworld boss. [Counters Plant-type]
金属之王，身上散发着无穷的霸气。[克制野兽系]: King of Metal, radiating boundless dominance. [Counters Beast-type]
金属宠物学院教授的知识很丰富，有机会我也想去会会那里的智者！: The Metal Pet Academy teaches a lot. If I get the chance, I'd like to meet the sages there!
金属遗迹里有很多厉害的金属系宠物。: There are many powerful Metal-type pets in the Metal Ruins.
金牛座的铁巨人哥哥。[克制野兽系]: The Taurus Iron Giant big brother. [Counters Beast-type]
金色的翅膀，很好很强大。[克制海洋系]: Golden wings—very good, very powerful. [Counters Ocean-type]
金银铜铁锡各国联合后的彩虹王国要比以前强大了不少。: After the gold, silver, copper, iron, and tin nations united, the Rainbow Kingdom became much stronger than before.
铁头的哥哥叫巨人。[克制野兽系]: Iron Head's older brother is called Giant. [Counters Beast-type]
铁甲将军好强啊，都是进化多次的宠物了吧。: That Ironclad General is so strong... it's a pet that's evolved many times, right?
长满斑点的101猪。[克制植物系]: A 101 pig covered in spots. [Counters Plant-type]
闪着奇幻光芒的螳螂。[克制植物系]: A mantis shining with magical light. [Counters Plant-type]
除了彩虹杯期间外，平常这个竞技场也有很多人参观。: Except during the Rainbow Cup, this arena also has many visitors.
隐藏于黑暗中的王者。[克制植物系]: A king hidden within darkness. [Counters Plant-type]
飞吻代表爱心。[克制飞行系]: A flying kiss means love. [Counters Flying-type]
饲养场内显示出来的宠物也能获得部分战斗经验，少爷一定要牢记这一点。: Even pets shown in the Ranch can gain some battle EXP. Young Master must remember this.
骁勇善战的嗜血将军。[克制野兽系]: A valiant, battle-hardened bloodthirsty general. [Counters Beast-type]
鹰之王，振翅间即可飞到九霄天外。[克制海洋系]: King of Eagles—can fly beyond the heavens in a single flap. [Counters Ocean-type]
（刚刚那个人，服饰好奇特，感觉很神秘呢，好像不是彩虹城的人...）: (That person just now... such strange clothes—very mysterious. Doesn't seem to be from Rainbow City...)
（奇怪，我为什么对一个陌生人这么激动？）: (Strange... why am I so excited about a stranger?)
（时候也不早了，我还是先回去调查那件事吧...）: (It's getting late. I'd better go back and investigate that matter first...)
（爷爷说的应该就是上宠物学院这个机会吧...）: (Grandpa must mean the chance to go to the Pet Academy...)
（脸红）那是因为爷爷培养的宠物厉害，和我没关系。: (Blush) That's because Grandpa's pets are strong—it has nothing to do with me.
